meanings.definition: Oncologists: medical doctors who specialize in the diagnosis and treatment of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The oncologists at the hospital work tirelessly to help cancer patients.
meanings.sent2: My friend's mom is an oncologist and helps people fight cancer every day.
meanings.sent3: Why did the oncologists bring a microscope to the party? To analyze the cell samples!
meanings.sent4: The oncologists are like skilled detectives, uncovering the secrets of cancer cells.
meanings.sent5: The oncologists' dedication to their patients is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: Oncologists: those who study and research cancer and its treatments.
meanings.sent1: Researchers and oncologists work together to find new ways to combat cancer.
meanings.sent2: The oncologists presented their findings at the international cancer conference.
meanings.sent3: Why did the oncologists bring a magnifying glass to the lab? To get a closer look at cancer cells!
meanings.sent4: In the world of cancer research, oncologists are the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The oncologists' passion for understanding cancer is unmatched.
